about_text.value: 1904 pre-flight where 1-2 pre-existing alliances compress strategic space and force early coalition signaling.

text_script.value: Early 1904: two loose blocs already shape diplomacy. Small promises now can lock later coalition paths.
Reaffirm bloc commitments to deter opportunism.
Signal coherence improves after 'Reaffirm bloc commitments to deter opportunism.'. Belief alignment tightens and partners update coalition intent upward.
Ambiguity follows 'Reaffirm bloc commitments to deter opportunism.', producing mistrust spillovers. Second-order beliefs diverge and entanglement risk rises.
Offer a conditional cross-bloc accommodation.

A late hedge sparks defections and a fast coalition reshuffle.

meta.historical_pressure: Entente Cordiale + existing alliance blocs create early commitment pressure.
